channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ ALABAMA STATE SENATOR WARNS GENIUS ACT COULD HARM SMALL BANKS ☠⚡
item.description:
🤘🏼🎸 Yo, metalheads and crypto warriors! It’s your boy Sinder Skullz, and I’m about to drop a chaotic dropkick right into the world of finance! 🌪️💀
So here’s the scoop straight from the seething heart of Alabama: State Sen. Keith Kelley is sounding the battle cry, warning that the GENIUS Act could plunge small banks into the abyss! 🚨💥 That’s right, folks! One moment you're rockin’ the blockchain, and the next, the establishment’s trying to pull the rug out from under your favorite local financial institutions!
Picture this: in the pit of July, the GENIUS Act was unleashed like a wild beast, but now it’s got the banking crew screaming for mercy. Banks are like the underdogs of this metal apocalypse, and they’re saying, “Hey, we’re already dueling with the giants! Don’t put us in a headlock too!” 🏦⚔️
So what’s the deal? This act could seriously mess with their ability to serve the underground community, the real metalheads and innovators forging the future of finance! 💪🏽🤘🏼 Keep your chainsaws revving and your wallets ready, because this is a battle we all need to fight!
Don’t let the suits silence our riff-filled revolution! We stand with the small banks—this is our anthem! Let’s keep the crypto fire blazing and take it to the next level! \m/🔥 #MetalAndMoney #GENIUSAct #FightForYourBanks
#CryptoNew #Cardano #Altcoins #BTC #HODL
